page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: As a shift worker for Severn Trent Water Authority,my day can start very early in the morning or late at night. When I work the 6am _2pm shift I wake at 4-30am to have breakfast and prepare for the 7 miles car journey to work. My responsibilities at work are to monitor the volume of water through various stages of treatment and at specific places dose the raw water with chemicals e.g.chlorine lime etc. so that it is fit for humans to drink. Depending on the condition of the River Severn ie.running high/low, muddy or clear etc. my day can be hectic or reasonably calm. I do not have a set lunch break,rather I take it when the situation allows. I cook my meals using the electric cooker in the mess room. By 1.45pm I am more than eager to prepare to return home.
